unnormalised: Heavy traffic reported on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway near Lonavala. Commuters are advised to expect delays of up to 2 hrs due to ongoing road repairs. The repair work, started on 10/10/2024, is expected to continue until 25/10/2024.
normalised: Heavy traffic reported on the Mumbai Pune Expressway near Lonavala. Commuters are advised to expect delays of up to two hours due to ongoing road repairs. The repair work, started on tenth october two thousand and twenty four, is expected to continue until twenty fifth october two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: According to officials, the congestion stretches for approx. 15 km near the Khandala exit. Motorists traveling from Mumbai towards Pune are requested to take the old Mumbai-Pune highway via NH48 as an alternative route. The old highway might add about 1 hr to the journey time, but it's better than being stuck, right?
normalised: According to officials, the congestion stretches for approximately fifteen kilometer near the Khandala exit. Motorists traveling from Mumbai towards Pune are requested to take the old Mumbai Pune highway via N-H-forty eight as an alternative route. The old highway might add about one hour to the journey time, but it's better than being stuck, right?

unnormalised: Travel time from Mumbai to Pune via the expressway is currently estimated at 5 hrs instead of the usual 3 hrs. Plan your journey accordingly and maybe pack extra snacks and chai! Drive safe, folks!
normalised: Travel time from Mumbai to Pune via the expressway is currently estimated at five hours instead of the usual three hours. Plan your journey accordingly and maybe pack extra snacks and chai! Drive safe, folks!
